timeline.bodyText: This is a new feature instead of bug fixes.
timeline.author: jiajunwang

@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
+ -----
+ Release Notes for Apache Helix 0.9.9
+ -----
+

+~~ NOTE: For help with the syntax of this file, see:
+~~ http://maven.apache.org/guides/mini/guide-apt-format.html
+
+Release Notes for Apache Helix 0.9.9
+
+  The Apache Helix team would like to announce the release of Apache Helix 0.9.9.
+
+  This is the twenty-fourth release under the Apache umbrella, and the twentieth as a top-level project.
+
+  Helix is a generic cluster management framework used for the automatic management of partitioned, replicated and distributed resources hosted on a cluster of nodes.
+
+  In this release, Helix provides several interface improvements and bug fixes:
+
+[]
+
+* Key Note for Helix Release
+
+** Critical Bug Fixes and Craftsmanship Improvements

timeline.bodyText: If nothing about bug fixes, just remove this line.
timeline.author: jiajunwang
timeline.diffHunk:

+ -----

+ -----
+
+~~ Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one

+~~ distributed with this work for additional information

+~~ under the License.
+
+~~ NOTE: For help with the syntax of this file, see:
+~~ http://maven.apache.org/guides/mini/guide-apt-format.html
+
+Release Notes for Apache Helix 0.9.9
+
+  The Apache Helix team would like to announce the release of Apache Helix 0.9.9.
+
+  This is the twenty-fourth release under the Apache umbrella, and the twentieth as a top-level project.
+
+  Helix is a generic cluster management framework used for the automatic management of partitioned, replicated and distributed resources hosted on a cluster of nodes.
+
+  In this release, Helix provides several interface improvements and bug fixes:
+
+[]
+
+* Key Note for Helix Release
+
+** Critical Bug Fixes and Craftsmanship Improvements
+
+    In this release, we added Helix participant auto registration feature for cloud environment, e.g. Azure. With this feature, a Helix participant can automatically get its fault domain information from cloud provider, and join the cluster with this information when participant starts.
+
+[]
+
+* Detailed Changes
+
+** Bug Fixes

timeline.bodyText: I suggest to call it new features.
timeline.author: jiajunwang

+
+Release Notes for Apache Helix 0.9.9
+
+  The Apache Helix team would like to announce the release of Apache Helix 0.9.9.
+
+  This is the twenty-fourth release under the Apache umbrella, and the twentieth as a top-level project.
+
+  Helix is a generic cluster management framework used for the automatic management of partitioned, replicated and distributed resources hosted on a cluster of nodes.
+
+  In this release, Helix provides several interface improvements and bug fixes:
+
+[]
+
+* Key Note for Helix Release
+
+** Critical Bug Fixes and Craftsmanship Improvements
+
+    In this release, we added Helix participant auto registration feature for cloud environment, e.g. Azure. With this feature, a Helix participant can automatically get its fault domain information from cloud provider, and join the cluster with this information when participant starts.
+
+[]
+
+* Detailed Changes
+
+** Bug Fixes
+
+** Improvements
